questions:

A) A building
B) A piece of artwork
C) A landscape
D) A person

B) A butterfly
C) A person
D) A car

What kind of artwork is shown in the photo?
A) A sculpture
B) A painting
C) A graffiti
D) A photograph

A) Blue  
B) White  
C) Red  
D) Yellow

What is written on the wall in the photo?
A) A poem
B) A list of names
C) Graffiti tags
D) A sign

A) Blue and green
B) Red and black
C) Yellow and orange
D) Purple and pink

B) Barbed wire
C) A cityscape

A) Realism
B) Abstract

A) White
B) Black
C) Red
D) Green

C) Red
